Track which GOP celebrities you saw at the #RNC!
Hypertext game documenting the first 1,000 days of the Syrian Civil War.
Play the role of officials from Amnesty International as you tackle the issue of the death penalty in one of six countries, including the USA.
An interactive quiz-based game to determine how "slutty" you are.
An interactive journey exploring the story of a nomad planet.
Marketplace attempt to let player decide how to reduce Federal budget deficit.
Budget Puzzle: You Fix the Budget
NYT attempt at fix-the-budget game, published 2010.
Another great quiz/CYOA game from MoJo.
Charlie Sheen v Muammar Gaddafi: whose line is it anyway?
Quiz game about quotes from the two celebs.
An idea involving "micro games" embedded throughout news stories.
A cool and simple strategy game where you play the President of Europe tasked with reducing emissions.
Tower defense-style game allowing player to fight climate change. Two modes of realism.
A series of games when the player assumes control of a US Marines and deals with realistic combat situtations. Trauma and stress play a huge factor in these games.
Those damn streakers are at it again! Try to stop them, or try to evade the cops...naked!
The agony of industrial meat production. Sometimes, horse meat gets in the mix...
Strategy game that simulates piracy in the Gulf of Aden and Indian Ocean.
Simulates the concepts of network security. Used as a training tool for government employees.
Strategy game that simulates dynamics of refugee camps and aid in Darfur.
A US Military training simulation designed based on experiences of soldiers in the battlefield. Meant to facilitate virtual training of soldiers.
Think you have what it takes to collect people's personal data online?
A strategy game where you play a budding journalist who is faced with ethical dilemmas. A companion to the documentary "A Fragile Trust."
Government simulation game where you play the role of a leader who much address the needs of their citizens through policy choices.
Parody game about Kinkos and customer relations.
An interesting attempt to make a strategy game about Syrian Civil War in two weeks.
The Sim City of energy-focused urban planning.
Street Fighter-style brawl with religious figures.
Prediction game where players can chime in on real U.S. Supreme Court cases.
An interactive documentary exploring sexual harassment of women in India. Excellent work.
An interesting quiz game testing accuracy of statements Barrack Obama and Mitt Romney made. Also, there is stripping...
Fun election game with quizzes and challenges.
Strategy game that simulates the evolution of how the FDA inspects food imports.
Prevent the Vectoralist from consuming free knowledge in this criticique of copyright.
Strategy game that simulates running a video game company.
Game Time: Test Your Mayoral IQ
I made this in 2011 for the San Francisco Mayoral race using Flash.
Game Time: The Occupy Movement Survival Game
Made by CK Hickey, the game tests your ability to survive a protest.
Awesome NYT game that tests how well you can drive while being distracted. There's an Easter Egg too.
An interactive quiz-based game showing different tracks to overturn Citizens United.
This is a project seven journalism students, including myself, worked on to cover California's ballot measures in a different way. Several quizzes.
A driving game exploring the idea of Smart Highways, roadways that glow-in-the-dark.
An interactive quiz-like game exploring whether you should seek medical attention for the flu.
Unity-powered exploration of a farm that you can interact with. Doesn't load on Chrome.
A fast-paced game by ProPublica where you try and save people having heart attacks.
A funny game where you play Federal Reserve Chair Ben Bernanke as you try to prevent economic apocalypse.
How Y’all, Youse and You Guys Talk
Guess the year when a radio segment was aired.
Is Your Sexual History As Impressive As You Think?
Compares your sexual habits to that of other Americans based on survey results.
Puzzle game about saving the Chilean miners trapped inside mine.
Puzzle game about using police to kettle protesters; U.K.-based.
Strategy game that simulates the difference between the seasonal flu and swine flu.
Real-world simulations of actual modern battles; U.S.-centric.
Puzzle game where player matches like professions for downsizing; criticizes American bank bailouts.
A somber game where the player has to maintain the flames burning in memory of Madrid bombings.
Strategy game that simulates running a transnational fast food company.
A game acommanying the documentary "The Undocumented" where you try to safely cross the border from Mexico.
A wacky debate game where you have to have quick typing skills to win.
This game will allow players to create a fantasy team of candidates to track over the 2012 races.
A tedious game meant to communicate child exploitation in Uzbekistan.
Strategy game that simulates energy politics through the lens of running an American oil company.
Silence those who would tell the world of child abuse by priests in this distrubing game.
Puzzle game meant to be a commentary on segregation in society.
People Power: The Game of Civil Resistance
Play the role of a non-violent political force as you attempt to compel change against an oppressive regime.
A puzzle game educating players about the life of a smartphone, from raw resource to disposal. Banned by Apple.
Photo matching game based on the story they represent.
An interactive documentary exploring illegal fishing off the coast of Sierra Leone.
Strategy game that simulates immigration and the process of citizenship.
Flex your critical thinking and ethical dilemma muscles in this colonization game.
A Cabal!-inspired game where you play a South African soldier hunting poachers.
Social news and quiz-based prediction app.
A game that editorializes on the tedium of the War on Terror.
A puzzle game exploring the concept of the SpaceX experimental rocket.
Player has to survive a month after being laid off and with little savings.
Pick where you think the soccer ball is on the photo. Documents user response.
Super Mario Bros. BP Oil Spill
Parody on BP Oil Spill where Mario has to plug the leaks with fish.
A game much like SPENT that instead focuses on extreme poverty in India.
Strategy game that simulates a sweatshop-style manufacturing plant, modeled after tower defense games.
A text-based choose-your-own adventure game where you play the role of a Syrian refugee who has to decide how to get their family safely to Europe.
A quiz that explores political ethics in Florida.
You're a good guy with a gun. Kill the bad guys with guns.
A game I made where you play a congressional candidate running for office in 2014.
Futuristic game that discusses contemporary issues of civil liberties and security in England.
Strategy game that simulates politics involved with redistricting.
A multimedia choose-your-own-adventure game where you play a Syrian woman who has to decide whether to take there family to Europe or Turkey for safety.
Keep public opinion on your side by controlling what content is published in the state newspaper.
Based off of public opinion polls, answer policy questions quickly and see where you rank.
Think Oakland's deficit is easy to fix? Use this to do it yourself
Evan Wagstaff made this deficit balancer for Oakland North in 2010.
Try to find names to trademark without colliding with already existing trademarks.
What happens when you mix political rhetoric with actual poetry.
A day in the life of a drone pilot.
What Time of Swing Voter Are You?
Another C.K. Hickey game trying to determine what kind of swing voter you are.
Who's Hurt By the Fiscal Cliff?
NYT interactive allowing people to explore different scenarios when particular options are on or off the table during US fiscal cliff fiasco.
Strategy game that simulates building wind power in an attempt to make it profitable.
Experience war from the perspective of those who suffer most: the civilians trapped in war zones.
Immersive US history game geared toward middle and high school students.
